name: Radisson Blu
shortDescription: Radisson Blu offers a great range of services and facilities such as spas, on-site restaurants and much more.

name: Vivanta by Taj
shortDescription: Experience a haven of luxury and comfort, ideally located in the middle of bustling cities and towns.

name: Courtyard by Marriot
shortDescription: Dive into a world of luxury, where you can start your mornings with a serene sunrise and savor gourmet dining.
